Articles.Content:
Recently there was some od (pre)released, well it was only one part, inflatable heatshield for DR.

Can someone provide a link? I dont remember name and cant find it.

Klockheed Martian special parts has 1.25m and 2.5m inflatable heat shields, and they work with Deadly Re-entry.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84224

Unfortunately the inflatable part is meant to be used for buoyancy after splashdown, so if you set it to auto-inflate, it will only inflate just before splashdown.

But it still works fine with DR, you just need to manually inflate it before re-entry.
